project.name: J-C088A-JENA-03-ST02-DT02-DF18-CF03-01
project.description: This test takes in data from an argument, that is intended to contain parameters for an 'find' command. The test does not perform checks on the parameters, however, and it is possible to include other, unexpected commands as part of the find parameter set.
